componentDescription: The Slider component allows users to select a single value from a predefined range by dragging a thumb.

min.description: Specifies the minimum possible value the slider can reach.

max.description: Specifies the maximum possible value the slider can reach.

value.description: The current controlled value of the slider.

defaultValue.description: The initial uncontrolled value of the slider.

step.description: The interval by which the slider's value changes when adjusted.

stepValues.description: An optional array of specific values the slider thumb should snap to.

shape.description: Defines the visual shape characteristics of the slider components.

size.description: Determines the overall size of the slider component.

variant.description: Specifies the visual style variant of the slider.

orientation.description: Sets the orientation of the slider, either horizontal or vertical.

isDisabled.description: If true, the slider will be disabled and users cannot interact with it.

showValue.description: If true, the slider's current value will be visibly displayed.

showTooltip.description: If true, a tooltip will appear on hover or drag displaying the current value.

label.description: A react node to use as a label for the slider component.

helperText.description: Supplementary text displayed below the slider to provide additional context or instructions.

onChange.description: Callback function invoked when the slider's value changes.

onDrag.description: Callback function invoked continuously while the slider thumb is being dragged.

views.description: Custom styles that can be applied to different parts of the slider component.

shadow.description: Properties to control the shadow appearance of the slider component.

ariaLabel.description: An accessible label for the slider, used by screen readers.
